name: The Munch-Hausen Slide
description:
Relive the childhood nightmare of eating vegetables. Play as Timmy as he tries to run away from his grandmother as he doesn't want to eat his vegetables. Solve puzzles as Timmy slides and avoids Grandma and her vegetable minions as you try to escape from the cursed dinner table.

Features:

  • Slide, puzzle game
  • Collect candy
  • Don't get caught
  • Grandma be comingA Game by Team Grandma

Project Lead - Sean

Lead Programmer - Ian

Lead Designer - Cypress

With Thanks To - Samuel Hilliard, Ryan Thaller
